incidents.title: DNS outage
incidents.content: We are aware that some DNS servers are not resolving the TJ nameservers properly leading to CSL services not loading.

incidents.title: Ion loading slowly
incidents.content: Ion is currently experiencing slow load times. We believe this to be linked to backend storage issues.

incidents.title: Elevated error rates
incidents.content:
We are investigating elevated error rates (500s on Ion, error 28 on Director mentioning no free space available).

2021-05-05T02:58:00.000Z
Temporary fix

The cause of this issue has been discovered. A temporary fix has been implemented. We are working on a permanent fix.

incidents.title: Storage backend upgrades
incidents.content: An upgrade to our storage backend will be performed over Spring break. There may be some intermittent periods of time when files stored on the CSL are inaccessible.

incidents.title: Ion inaccessible
incidents.content:
In certain cases, Ion may be inaccessible.

2021-03-23T02:22:58.210Z
Monitoring

A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring for any additional problems that may arise.

2021-03-23T14:15:36.022Z
Resolved

This incident has been resolved.

incidents.title: Storage cluster outage
incidents.content:
There is an outage on our storage cluster.

2021-03-22T14:08:19.119Z
Resolved

This incident has been resolved.

incidents.title: Ion maintenance
incidents.content:
Ion is under maintenance and may be inaccessible at certain times.

2021-02-25T03:00:00.000Z
Maintenance concluded

Maintenance has concluded.

incidents.title: Director management page not accessible
incidents.content:
The Director management page may not be accessible.

::: Resolved | 2021-02-13T00:06:39.038Z This issue has been resolved. :::

incidents.title: Director inaccessible
incidents.content:
Director may be inaccessible at this time. We are looking into the issue.

2021-02-12T22:19:14.819Z
Resolved

This issue has been resolved.
